Text.Value: I frightened the feathers off an owlbear with a single roar.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Child cheering] [Child raising weapon victoriously] [Child rallying friends]

Text.Value: I once roped a catoblepas and rode it like a horse!
I climbed the Ice Mountains and stabbed a yeti with an icicle.
Leave.
The goblins will chase us to Baldur's Gate - and the kids know it.
I've bested a red dragon in battle, and crafted a club from its tooth!
They've been talking about you. They hope you're going to come with us. Could you spare them a few words?
They've been talking about you. They hope you're going to come with us. Could you lift their spirits, maybe spare them a story or two?
Swords up, children. It's the Blade of Frontiers!

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Dialog with Asharak was completed by another PC before Wyll could trigger his OM.

Text.Value: Were you trying to scare them? Ugh - I'd better take care of this.
It's that or teach them to beg for their lives.
Hear that, children? A yeti! Do you have another?

EditorData.AnimationTags: ChadD: [DUPE] the children give a small cheer.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The children smile and give a small cheer

Text.Value: I wrestled a swamp croc... naked!
Chins up, children. It's the Blade of Frontiers!

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Dialog with Asharak was completed by another PC before Wyll could trigger his OM.

Text.Value: Swords up, children. It's the Blade of Frontiers!
Hardly necessary. I'll raid the goblin camp and kill them myself.
Please, just a quick story. It would really make their day.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Children gasp, S_DEN_Trainee_001 starts crying, ChadD: 2 of the children ghasp in shock. One starts crying.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: |Cinematic node: the children gasp in horror and S_DEN_Trainee_001 starts crying.|

Text.Value: Bad news, children: you're all going to die.
Hear that, children? An owlbear! Do you have another?

EditorData.AnimationTags: ChadD: the children give a small cheer.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The children smile and give a small cheer

Text.Value: You're teaching them to fight? They're mere children!
Thank you. I prefer when they smile.
I hope you'll live up to both your reputation and your promise. Thank you.
I won't be part of this. You'll get them all killed.

Synopsis: OM available only for Avatar Wyll. He arrived at the Grove and meets with Asharak and the training kids. Now he can boost the kids' spirits with a story.
